overview:
Dr. Srinivas is responsible for the overall product direction, technology and architecture at RedShift Networks. Srinivas comes with 16 plus years of experience in building and delivering cutting edge solutions in Systems, Networking, Security, Communications and Infrastructure.

Prior to that, Srinivas was VP, Technologies at Phoenix Technologies leading their cloud infrastructure efforts, CTO-office roles at NetContinuum (leader in Web Application Firewall category; acquired by Barracuda Networks) and Determina (leader in Host Intrusion Security; acquired by VMware).

Srinivas was also at MIPS Technologies (acquired by SGI) and HP-Labs. Srinivas is a frequent speaker in leading conferences, driving numerous standards and authored more than 25+ publications with 8 patents.

He holds a PhD in Computer Science from University of California, Irvine.
